Explain: The leader of the mysterious organization only briefly existed in the history. What's the true identity of this Memory?
Name: Cottie
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[3]: Radiation - Monsters have a damage field around them

Explain: As the renowned "brain" of the mysterious organization, Dr. Einsteina, the legendary Memory, has a secret side.
Name: Einsteina
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[2]: Berserk - Monsters have significantly increased attack and attack frequency, but lose defense
Des[3]: Flash - Monsters have a chance to teleport near the player

Explain: She's the No.3 database of the mysterious organization. Will anyone ever witness her power?
Name: Becky
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[2]: Recovery - Monsters recover a small amount of HP continuously over time
Des[3]: Penetration - Monsters' attacks also apply a stackable defense down effect

Explain: According to the record, this Memory is able to utilize sounds to manipulate people's mind. Will Gray Raven be able to resist the temptation?
Name: Condelina
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[2]: Lone Wolf - Claw gains a higher attack bonus when there are fewer monsters within a certain range
Des[3]: Lightning Shield - Monsters have a chance to summon lightning when attacked

Explain: She's the greatest weapon of the Syndicute. What will her power be...?
Name: Athmail
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[2]: Commander - Prisoner gains a higher attack bonus when there are more monsters within a certain range
Des[3]: Piercing Armor - Non-prisoner and summoned units take significantly more damage

Explain: A girl once lost her life in the pursuit of love. What Memory did she leave behind?
Name: Guinevere
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[2]: Freeze - Butcher's attacks deal Ice DMG and have a chance to slow or freeze
Des[3]: Flame - Butcher has a circle of flame around him, dealing damage over time

Explain: As the No.1 mad scientist of the Syndicute, she had stepped into the realm of death beyond any sanity. Yet, she faced a cruel future.
Name: Heisen
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[2]: Closed Loop - Monsters have a field around them and take significantly less damage outside the field.
Des[3]: ATK Boost - Monsters deal significantly higher damage

Explain: Gray Raven was looking forward to someone normal... This time, it's the hymn of emotions.
Name: Shakespeare
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[2]: Icy Path - Swordsman releases 1 Ice Pillar that tracks the player
Des[3]: Stealth - After attacking, Swordsman will disappear and move away from the player

Explain: This is dedicated to you, my beloved rose garden.
Name: Catherine
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[2]: Barrier - Riot Controller enters the combat with a shield

Explain: Aife was the last sniper and the greatest treasure left behind by the Syndicute. She must be rescued for the sake of the humanity's future.
Name: Aife
Des[1]: 3-min time limit. Monster will go berserk after 2 min.
Des[2]: Shield - Small shields are formed around Lancer periodically
Des[3]: Lightning Mine - Archer has a chance to launch a bomb to the player while attacking
